verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1 Verse:
Be still and know
That the Lord is in control
Be still my soul
Stand and watch as giants fall

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:

I won't be afraid You don't let go
Be still my heart and know
I won't be afraid
